.. internals_:

#####################
:mod:`yadr` Internals
#####################

This section documents the internals of :mod:`yadr`. This information
shouldn't be needed to use :mod:`yadr`. However, it may be useful for
maintaining the package.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   self
   /lexing.rst
   /parsing.rst
   /execution.rst
   /operators.rst
